valueMarkdown.value: This is the [LHC Form](https://loinc.org/lhc-forms/) Exercise Vital Sign (EVS) QuestionnaireResponse Example. It is based on the on US Core [Screening and Assessments](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/screening-and-assessments.html) guidance using Questionnaire/QuestionnaireResponse resources.
